content: Stadium in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Queenstown Stadium" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(February 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Queenstown Stadium** is located in [Queenstown](/wiki/Queenstown,_Singapore), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It seats 3,800 people, and is opened from 4.30am to 9.30pm. The stadium is a 10-minute walk from [Queenstown MRT station](/wiki/Queenstown_MRT_station). 1. Members - In 2010 and 2011, it hosted [Etoile FC](/wiki/Etoile_FC) of the [S.League](/wiki/S.League). - 2012 saw the return of [Tanjong Pagar United](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_United_FC) ## History - The stadium was built in 1970. It is the first sports complex built in Singapore. - The stadium was home to the [Tanjong Pagar United](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_United_FC) [S.League](/wiki/S.League) [soccer](/wiki/Football_(soccer)) team up to 2004. - In 2006, the [S.League](/wiki/S.League) team [Gombak United](/wiki/Gombak_United_FC) played their home games at the stadium. - In 2007, it hosted [Liaoning Guangyuan FC](/wiki/Liaoning_Guangyuan_FC) of the S.League. - In 2008, it hosted [Dalian Shide Siwu FC](/wiki/Dalian_Shide_Siwu_FC) of the S.League. - In 2010 and 2011, it hosted [Etoile FC](/wiki/Etoile_FC) of the S.League. - 2012 saw the return of Tanjong Pagar United ## Facilities & Structures Queenstown Stadium currently has a capacity of 3,800. ## Transport The nearest way to get to the stadium is by the [MRT](/wiki/Mass_Rapid_Transit_(Singapore)), but buses are also available. - [List of stadiums in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_stadiums_in_Singapore) - Frank Jasperneite images 1°17′45″N 103°48′09″E﻿ / ﻿1.29589°N 103.802417°E﻿ / 1.29589; 103.802417 This article about a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) sports venue is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Queenstown Stadium
